title.value: V2 Table Code System: Processing Priority

description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts which specify one or more available priorities for performing the observation or test. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the OM1 segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0168 (Processing Priority)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: As soon as possible (a priority lower than stat)

definition.value: As soon as possible (a priority lower than stat)

display.value: Preoperative (to be done prior to surgery)

definition.value: Preoperative (to be done prior to surgery)

display.value: Timing critical (do as near as possible to requested time)

definition.value: Timing critical (do as near as possible to requested time)

display.value: Measure continuously (e.g., arterial line blood pressure)

definition.value: Measure continuously (e.g., arterial line blood pressure)

display.value: Do at bedside or portable (may be used with other codes)

definition.value: Do at bedside or portable (may be used with other codes)
